thread.title: Best experience ever!
thread.title_full: Best experience ever! - Review of Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lucile Febe L
title: Best experience ever!
text: This hotel and its employees are exceptional with their service and hospitality. A special thank you to Hannah Franco who went above and beyond her duties to make our trip extremely special. They gave us an upgraded room with an amazing view and wine and chocolate were waiting for us in the room :) I highly recommend Dumont and will definitely stay there again!
